item.description: MYSQL Sleeping connections in MySQL When you check your MySQL process list via command show processlist;, it will show you a useful table which provide all current connection details. “Sleep” state connections are most connection pointer waiting for the timeout to terminate. Then they still count as a connection. (Can cause MySQL connection limit error, which default equal 150 connections) So next time, remember to close your connection before terminating your app.

item.description: HTTP Create cross-platform downloading app URL You have a mobile app for both platforms iOS and Android, each platform has different download URL. But your user doesn’t know which platform he using. Clicking wrong URL will lead to user bounce-rate. Solution is making only 1 URL to download your app, which can redirect to right place depends on using platform. So how we achieve this ?? The key of problem is detecting user platform, which can be done by extracting the User-Agent header from http request.
